mapper.sql: id,owername,phone,wechat,address,stage, building,number, label_id as labelId, cus_service as cusService, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate, data_status as dataStatus, remark, report_date as reportDate, member_id as memberId, store_id as storeId, clue_type as clueType
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dj_clue where data_status=0 and stage=#{stage}

SELECT
FROM dj_clue where data_status=0 and stage in (0,1) and phone=#{phone}

SELECT
FROM dj_clue where data_status=0 and stage IN (0,1)
select * from dj_clue WHERE data_status=0 and stage IN (0,1) and CONCAT(owername,phone,wechat) like CONCAT('%',#{values},'%')

select
c.id as clueId, c.owername, c.phone, c.wechat, c.address, c.stage, c.building,c.number, c.label_id as labelId, c.cus_service as cusService, c.create_date as createDate, c.modify_date as modifyDate, c.data_status as dataStatus, c.remark, c.report_date as reportDate, c.member_id as memberId, c.store_id as storeId, u.username as userName, c.phase_status as phaseStatus, c.clue_type as clueType
mc.id as mcId, c.id as clueId, mc.member_id as memberId, m.mobile as phone, m.nick_name as owername, mc.modify_date as modifyDate, m.create_date as createDate, mc.label_id_arr as labelId, u.username as userName, mc.report_date as reportDate, mc.phase_status as phaseStatus, mc.user_id as userId, mc.stage, c.remark, c.clue_type as clueType
from dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_user u on c.cus_service=u.id LEFT JOIN dj_clue_talk ct ON c.id=ct.clue_id
INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on c.member_id=mc.member_id and c.cus_service=mc.user_id INNER JOIN dj_member m on mc.member_id=m.id
WHERE
c.data_status=0 and c.stage in (0,1) and c.phase_status=0
and c.label_id like CONCAT('%',#{label},'%')
and CONCAT(c.owername,c.phone) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
and c.cus_service=#{userId}
and c.store_id=#{storeId}
GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.time_sequencing
desc
mc.data_status=0 and mc.stage in (0,1) and mc.phase_status=1 and c.phase_status=1
and mc.user_id=#{userId} and c.cus_service=#{userId}
and mc.store_id=#{storeId}
and mc.label_id_arr like CONCAT('%',#{label},'%')
and CONCAT(m.nick_name,c.owername,c.phone) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.time_sequencing
desc

SELECT
c.id as clueId, mc.id as mcId, if(m.nick_name is not null and m.nick_name!="",m.nick_name,c.owername) as name, c.phone, c.modify_date as modifyDate, c.cus_service as userId, c.member_id as memberId, c.phase_status as phaseStatus, c.stage
c.id as clueId, mc.id as mcId, mc.member_id as memberId, c.stage, m.mobile as phone, m.nick_name as name, h.create_date as createDate, mc.modify_date as modifyDate, h.completed_date as completedDate, CONCAT(IFNULL(h.residential,'*'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.building,'栋'),'*栋'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit,'单元'),'*单元'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.number,'号'),'*号')) as houseName, c.cus_service as userId, c.phase_status as phaseStatus
FROM dj_clue c
LEFT JOIN dj_member_customer mc on mc.member_id=c.member_id and mc.user_id=c.cus_service LEFT JOIN dj_member m on m.id=mc.member_id WHERE c.data_status = 0 and c.stage NOT IN (2,3,4,5)
and c.cus_service=#{userId}
and c.cus_service in
#{item.userId}
ORDER BY c.create_date desc
INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on mc.member_id=c.member_id and mc.user_id=c.cus_service INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.member_id = mc.member_id INNER JOIN dj_already_rob_single ars ON ars.user_id = c.cus_service AND ars.house_id = h.id INNER JOIN dj_member m on m.id=mc.member_id WHERE mc.data_status = 0 and c.data_status = 0 and c.phase_status=1 and mc.phase_status=1 and h.data_status =0
and h.visit_state =1
and h.visit_state =3
and c.cus_service=#{userId}
and c.cus_service in
#{item.userId}
ORDER BY h.create_date desc
limit 1

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc ON mc.member_id=c.member_id and mc.user_id=c.cus_service INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.member_id = mc.member_id WHERE (h.visit_state = 1 or h.visit_state = 3) and mc.phase_status=1 and c.phase_status=1 and c.data_status = 0 and mc.data_status = 0 and c.cus_service=#{userId} and date_format(mc.modify_date,'%Y-%m')=#{time}

SELECT c.id as clueId, c.cus_service as userId, c.owername as name, c.phone, c.wechat, c.modify_date AS modifyDate, c.create_date AS createDate, c.label_id AS labelIdArr, u.username as userName, c.phase_status as phaseStatus, mc.member_id as memberId, c.clue_type as clueType FROM dj_clue c inner join dj_user u on c.cus_service=u.id LEFT JOIN dj_member_customer mc on mc.member_id = c.member_id and mc.user_id = c.cus_service WHERE c.stage=2 and c.store_id=#{storeId} and c.data_status=0
AND c.cus_service=#{staff}
AND CONCAT(c.owername,c.phone) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
order by c.modify_date
desc
select COUNT(0) from(select count(0) from dj_clue c where phone = #{mobile} GROUP BY c.cus_service)a

select
h.id as houseId, h.member_id as memberId, h.city_id as cityId, h.village_id as villageId, h.visit_state as visitState, h.create_date as houseCreateDate, h.city_name as cityName, h.residential as villageName, h.build_square as buildSquare, h.style as style, h.square as square, h.decoration_type as decorationType, h.residential as residential, h.unit as unit, h.building as houseBuilding, h.drawings, h.is_rob_stats as isRobStats, h.number as houseNumber, h.house_type as houseType, h.construction_date as constructionDate, h.completed_date as completedDate,
c.branch_user as branchUser, c.create_date as createDate, c.owername as owerName, c.phone as phone, c.wechat as wechat, c.remark as remark, c.address as address, c.building as building, c.number as number, c.id as clueId, c.cus_service as cusService, c.clue_type as clueType, c.phase_status as phaseStatus, mc.id as mcId, mc.user_id as userId, mc.member_id as memberId, mc.label_id_arr as labelIdArr, mc.create_date as mcCreateDate, mc.stage as stage from dj_clue c
INNER JOIN dj_house h on h.member_id = c.member_id LEFT JOIN dj_already_rob_single ars ON ars.user_id = c.cus_service AND ars.house_id = h.id
INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on c.member_id = mc.member_id and mc.user_id = c.cus_service
1=1
and h.data_status = 0
and c.member_id = #{memberId}
and c.cus_service = #{userId}

select count(0) from ( SELECT c.owername as name, c.phone, c.modify_date AS modifyDate, c.create_date AS createDate, c.label_id AS labelIdArr, u.username as userName FROM dj_clue c inner join dj_user u on c.cus_service=u.id WHERE (c.member_id IS NULL or c.member_id='') and c.stage=2 and c.store_id=#{storeId} and c.data_status=0 and c.tips = 1 UNION SELECT if(m.name is not null and m.name!="",m.name,m.nick_name) as name, m.mobile AS phone, mc.modify_date AS modifyDate, mc.create_date AS createDate, mc.label_id_arr AS labelIdArr, u.username as userName FROM dj_member m INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc ON m.id=mc.member_id inner join dj_user u on mc.user_id=u.id WHERE mc.stage=2 and mc.store_id=#{storeId} and mc.data_status=0 and mc.tips = 1 ) a
mapper.update:
update dj_clue c
INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on c.member_id=mc.member_id and c.cus_service=mc.user_id
set c.stage=2
,mc.stage=2
where 1=1
and mc.id=#{mcId}
and c.id=#{clueId}

update dj_clue c
INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on c.member_id=mc.member_id and c.cus_service=mc.user_id
set c.tips=0
,mc.tips=0
where 1=1
mapper.select: select c.id as clueId, mc.member_id as memberId, hd.latitude, hd.longitude, mc.modify_date as modifyDate, c.store_id as storeId from dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_house h on c.member_id=h.member_id INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on mc.member_id=c.member_id INNER JOIN dj_house_address hd on h.id=hd.house_id where (c.cus_service IS NULL or c.cus_service="")
mapper.update: update dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc on c.member_id=mc.member_id set c.store_id=#{storeId}, mc.store_id=#{storeId}, mc.modify_date = #{date} where c.member_id=#{memberId}
